about_the_game:
In Torn Apart, you can play with up to 8 players, where one player is secretly chosen as the traitor. The traitor's mission is to kill the other players and sabotage the group's efforts to survive the zombie apocalypse. It's up to the rest of the group to work together, identify the traitor, and prevent the camp from falling to the undead.

Features:
  • 8-Player-Multiplayer
  • Complete free-to-play-prototype
  • Integrated proximity chat
  • Many traps to get rid of your group in creative ways
  • Unlimited betrayal



The game is set in a post-apocalyptic world where the last survivors are fighting for their lives. As a member of the group, you'll need to gather resources, fortify your defenses, and be on the lookout for any signs of treachery. Keep your eyes open and your wits about you, because the traitor could be anyone. But beware, the zombies won't wait for you to figure out who the traitor is. They'll keep coming in waves, and each one will be more difficult to fend off than the last. You'll need to work quickly and efficiently to stay alive. Rebuild your fences every round and make sure no zombie is able to catch you!



Not only can you play Torn Apart for free, but you can also invite all your friends to join in on the fun. That's right - you and up to 7 friends can play Torn Apart together without any cost. And we didn't stop there! We also added proximity voice chat into the game, which means that you can communicate with your friends in real-time and really immerse yourself in the game's world. Talk tactics, share intel, and strategize to take down the zombie horde and uncover the traitor. So what are you waiting for?



Please note that Torn Apart is currently in the prototype phase, and we're excited to hear your feedback to help us improve the game. We want to ensure that Torn Apart meets the expectations of players like you and becomes a game that everyone can enjoy. We are in love with Torn Apart, and with your help, we can fine-tune the game mechanics, balance, and overall experience to make it the best it can be. Your feedback and suggestions are valuable to us, and we encourage you to share them with us. Let us know if you are interested in Torn Apart becoming a full game via forum or our discord!



So join the fight against the undead and take on the challenge of surviving in Torn Apart. Play with your friends, uncover the traitor, and defend the camp against the zombie horde. Help us shape this game into something great!
detailed_description:

You can reach out to us about this prototype through Steam, Discord or social media. Feel free to tell us more about your experience with "Torn Apart". Do you have any suggestions? If you want more of this game, we'll make it happen. Let your voice be heard and help shape the future of this exciting and unique gaming experience. We thrive on your feedback and we want to create something special with your help!
